ygData.subject: Re: Blast it!
ygData.msgSnippet: Firestrike snapped back. Don t worry bout my face, I think about more things than my looks. You should too then maybe you wouldn t have looked jsut like that

Firestrike snapped back.  
"Don't worry bout my face, I think about more things than my looks.  
You should too then maybe you wouldn't have looked jsut like that 
after every battle, especially when you couldn't even kill off 
Optimus."
--- In nbwrpg@y..., "robertdahl" <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron snickered a sarcastic snicker.  "What a fool...You call I,
> Megatron, weak?  Don't let your mouth make your face what mine has 
become
> right now..." Megatron said, referring to the missing half of his 
head and
> face.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <gunthers8@n...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 11:30 PM
> Subject: Re: Blast it!
> 
> 
> > Firestrike grinned. "There is no need, the damage has been done
> > already and you are weak now.  I am not saying I will not follow 
you
> > Megatron, you have done much, and taken the Decepticons far. What 
I
> > am saying however, is I will not cowl under your antics, to be 
one of
> > your lackeys you can throw around.  That does nothing but weaken 
the
> > moral of one and the strength of many."
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > > Megatron looked straight at Firestrike, his hands on his 
hips. "I am
> > > busy now Nightstrike." He then looked Firestrike with a stare 
that
> > would
> > > crush a warship. "Then shoot me, shoot up the Decepticon cause,
> > until I
> > > came around the Decepticons were just a pipe dream, I built this
> > maching
> > > of conquest, SHOOT ME." he yelled.
> > >
> > > Menasor looked on in confusion at what was happening, first at
> > > Firestrike, then Megatron.
> >
> >
